content: > use these codes to save when you buy > multiple patterns > - saveon3 to save 10% off 3 patterns > - saveon5 to save 15% off 5 patterns > - saveon8 to save 20% off 8 patterns > > add all patterns to cart for discount > limit one use per purchase just a cute friendly jellyfish to brighten your day because the tails are long please supervise small children playing with it - we don t want to get tangled with the jellyfish i used 1 5 skeins of bernat handicafter cotton for the main color and half a skein for the secondary color gauge is not critical free version is on my blog or you can purchase an ad free pdf here
